Solve question (1) with the condition that at every 2nd move, the top left number is erased and replaced by a 0.

I/P 

2
3
72 73 49 
67 10 14 
42 77 26 
0 49 0 
42 10 14 
72 77 26 
4
53 51 45 44 
29 15 81 85 
15 83 46 31 
13 86 72 13 
0 51 45 44 
29 15 81 85 
83 46 31 15 
13 86 72 13

O/P 

72 73 49 67 10 14 42 77 26 
42 73 49 72 10 14 67 77 26 
0 73 49 42 10 14 72 77 26 
49 0 73 42 10 14 72 77 26 
0 49 0 42 10 14 72 77 26 
53 51 45 44 29 15 81 85 15 83 46 31 13 86 72 13 
53 51 45 44 29 15 81 85 31 15 83 46 13 86 72 13 
0 51 45 44 29 15 81 85 83 46 31 15 13 86 72 13
